comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:10.0a1) Gecko/20111014 Firefox/10.0a1
Build ID: 20111014030948

Steps to reproduce:

1. Open enough tabs to fill the tab bar and to show the scroll arrows
2. Go to the end and middle click on the tab before the last one


Actual results:

The tabs don't fill the tab bar untill you move the mouse outside the tab bar


Expected results:

Tabs should fill up the tab bar immediately
